function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Limited effectiveness of individual social distancing measures","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Heterogeneity and publication bias in meta-analysis","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Possible publication bias in the study","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High heterogeneity among studies","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Missed cases in the trim-and-fill test","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Late adoption of nphis leading to icu saturation","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difficulty in measuring unique impact of specific nphis","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Economic impact of early nphis such as lockdown","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Demographic characteristics and population densities impacting the effectiveness of nphis in controlling covid-19 spread.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited number of studies considering demographic and geographic factors in analyzing the effectiveness of nphis.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of the role of health data infrastructures in evaluating nphi effectiveness in pandemics.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Under-reporting of data due to mass panic in low-resource countries","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliability and validity of publicly available data from countries with poor data infrastructure","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Observational nature of included studies and lack of clinical trials due to the pandemic","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Not all studies have used a complete number of possible covariates in the analysis, potentially leading to limited findings.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Confounding effect of covid-19 diagnosis testing considerations on outcomes.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty of a country’s actual total number of infected individuals due to dependence on testing strategies and number of tests performed.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dismissal of contextual factors and merging of intervention results from different countries in the meta-analysis.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Negative impact of harsh restrictions on the economy and people’s lives","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Problems with universal access to vaccines and their effectiveness","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of evaluation of nphis effectiveness in different countries","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited quantitative studies in biophilic design","category":"Arts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difficulty in quantifying environmental psychology factors","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of specific user groups in biophilic design may lead to inadequate health and well-being outcomes for certain individuals.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate quantification of exposure time to nature and contact frequency may result in suboptimal biophilic design outcomes.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of scientific substantiation and quantitative evaluation in biophilic architecture may lead to unverified design concepts and ineffective implementation.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Intensive energy use and maintenance required for highly artificial ’green’ designs","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of diversity in biophilic design practices","category":"Arts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of integration of subfields in architectural research","category":"Arts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contested and ambiguous notion of ’nature’ in biophilic design","category":"Arts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misunderstanding of culture and context leading to inappropriate information or abuse","category":"Arts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disputes exist between unprocessed, crafted, and synthetic natural materials","category":"Arts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Biophilic design elements leading to excessive uncertainty and controversy","category":"Arts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overlap and repetition of biophilic design elements","category":"Arts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Biophilic design may not be effectively implemented in sustainable architecture","category":"Arts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disagreement on the interpretation of challenges in sustainable architecture","category":"Arts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overlaps and repetitions in biophilic design elements may lead to confusion in interpretation and implementation.","category":"Arts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Diverse nature attributes and their classification in architectural design","category":"Arts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Divergent elements in nature-based architectural design theories","category":"Arts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Psychological experience of nature in architectural design","category":"Arts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ambiguous terminology around ’experience of space and place’ and its relation to contact with nature","category":"Arts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overlap and ambiguity in the categorization of nature-related elements in the frameworks","category":"Arts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Requirement for specific arrangements for producing pleasurable experiences in nature-related spaces","category":"Arts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Biophilic design may be misinterpreted or misapplied, leading to ineffective implementation of nature-based elements in architecture.","category":"Arts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate incorporation of nature-based elements in architecture may result in a lack of human-nature connection and reduced well-being for building occupants.","category":"Arts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to consider the cultural and ecological context of natural elements in biophilic design may lead to insensitivity or disconnection with the local environment and community.","category":"Arts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ambiguity in the definition of ’natural spaces’ and ’biophilic design’ may lead to inconsistent interpretation and implementation.","category":"Arts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of clarity in taxonomies of ’nature’ in the frameworks may result in misinterpretation and inappropriate application of biophilic design principles.","category":"Arts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Differences in interpretations and frameworks may lead to conflicting design approaches and criteria for biophilic design in practice.","category":"Arts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on ’nature’ for survival leading to potential contamination and spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"}]}
